name: Feline Frostin'
description:
Could this truly be sweet release?

Feline Frostin' is an arcade-style endless scroller where you defeat enemies and transcend this mortal coil.

Originally created for the GXC #NoticeMe Game Jam event, where it was originally published to gxc.gg.
_________

Controls

ARROWS - Move

Z - Attack / Confirm (Menu)

X - Cancel (Menu)

ENTER - Start

_________

Features
  • An endless randomly generated two-dimensional platformer level.
  • A day-night cycle with varying difficulty and gameplay.
  • A cute, completely innocent pink cat. (...?)

_________

Credits Designer, artist and programmer - Landon Haugh ("Landimizer")

Assistant designer - Ricky Gomez ("RickyG")

Assistant artist and lead composer - Angelo S. ("SMario8282")

Assistant artist and cover artist - Francisco G. ("SuxMenner")
